hackathon-description-text: We're excited to announce CarlHacks, Carleton College's second national hackathon. Whether you've been programming for five minutes or five years, you'll find CarlHacks to be an incredible space to learn more. Bring your next big idea to life over the course of 36 hours (napping strongly encouraged), attend a cornucopia of workshops, and join an awesome community of hackers.
hackathon-eligibility: Undergrads from any university in the US are invited.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: First: Dell Venue 10 Pro tablets + Raspberry Pi 2 Kit
Third: Arduino Uno R3 Kit & Anker External Battery

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=501 Three Oaks Drive, Northfield, MN 55057, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is the hack more than just another generic social/mobile/local app? Does it do something entirely novel, or at least take a fresh approach to an old problem?
Is the hack practical and something people would actually use? Does it fulfill a real need people have?
Is the hack usable in its current state? Is the user experience smooth? Does everything appear to work? Is it well designed?

hackathon-location-address: 501 Three Oaks Drive, Northfield, MN 55057, USA
